content: got a knack for knitting whip up a cute little plushy heart using your sock weight or dk scraps each heart takes less than 20gr of yarn and works up in only a few hours make one for everyone you love including yourself please note this pattern is worked using 3 double-pointed needles until the split for the tops then you ll need 5 needles for the body of the heart the front half is on needle 1 the back half is on needle 2 and the third needle is for knitting heart is worked in rounds from bottom point **sizing and gauge ** approximately 4 across by 4 tall sock weight 14 sts/ 21 rounds per 2 / 5cm dk weight 11 sts/ 18 rounds per 2 / 5cm suggested materials 1 locking stitch markers large-eye needle to weave in ends stuffing of choice polyfil yarn scraps sock weight yarn over new york sock/ fingering weight yarn or equivalent yarn approximately 20gr times square sock broadway sparkle sock harlem sock wave hill zebra fingering alphabet city tweed us 1 2 25mm set of 5 dpns double pointed needles dk weight yarn over new york dk yarn or equivalent yarn approximately 20gr can substitute sock yarn held double greenwich village dk kew gardens merino/nylon dk tribeca sparkle dk us 2 5 3mm set of 5 dpns double pointed needles find yarn at yarnovernewyork com 1 1 https //yarnovernewyork com/
